description:
According to Don Lemon, the most profitable time of his career was fear-mongering the masses about COVID-19, despite him getting nearly everything wrong. This combined with the mostly peaceful 2020 riots was the highest point of his career.

DON LEMON: “The highest point of CNN was during COVID. We had COVID and George Floyd at the same time, and Donald Trump. That was the was the highest ratings, the most profitable of CNN … People watched every night … because you were stuck.” pic.twitter.com/6OrdJmFGAa
— Chief Nerd (@TheChiefNerd) March 16, 2025
title: Don Lemon doesn't realize what he's saying when he brags about this being CNN's "best" year in ratings

description:
According to Joy Reid, America “is not a land of opportunity for people” with her skin color. However, it’s unclear what she means by that considering she has a higher net worth than the majority of Americans. Nonetheless, she claims her mom realized that after immigrating from Guyana, even though this “land” made her daughter worth millions of dollars for saying the most outrageous nonsense on TV.

Joy Reid: "When my mother came from Guyana she realized it is not a land of opportunity for people like us"

Average salary in Guyana: $5,200
Joy Reid's MSNBC salary: $3 million pic.twitter.com/M3q2UKwNWw
— End
title: Joy Reid, who is a multimillionaire, lashes out at America not being a "land of opportunity"

description:
According to the fake news media, enforcing federal immigration laws is outdated. However, the American people seem to disagree, which is why Tom Homan had no choice but to slam the fake news reporter who claimed this legal practice was too old-fashioned to enforce.

🚨 Tom Homan just EMBARRASSED a fake news activist over Trump’s use of the Alien Enemies Act to deport gang members 🤣

REPORTER: “That law is 200 years old!”

HOMAN: “Well, the Constitution is a lot older than that and we still follow it, don’t we?” 🔥
pic.twitter.com/AK9rkfJ3gb
— Nick Sortor (@nicksortor)
title: Tom Homan EMBARRASSES smug reporter with a brief lesson on immigration and how our Constitution works

description:
CNN and NBC released polls showing the Democrat's approval rating has hit an all-time low. Today’s show breaks down why the left keeps losing.

- YouTube
title: Watch: Democrats are down bad, but the future looks bright for America!

description:
Former Vice President Joe Biden’s last minute pardons appear to have been signed by autopen, potentially voiding them, President Donald Trump invoked the Alien Enemies Act of 1798 to deport MS-13 and Tren de Aragua members to El Salvador despite a judge’s attempt to block the process, the President also took serious military action on Thursday which resulted in the killing of ISIS chief Abu Khadijah ahead of further anticipated action against the Houthis in Yemen, Libertarian Representative Thomas Massie wasn’t pleased, CNN & NBC both released polls showing Democrat approval rating has hit an all-time low, and much more!

DEMS DOWN BAD & THE FUTUR
title: Trump: Terrorist Grim Reaper or Pentagon’s Lapdog? (Sources)

description:
Polls show that the Democrat Party is as popular as herpes, NFL referees, and the Death Riders storyline in AEW. That's bad for Democrats, good for America, and amazeballs for political content. We've reached the stage of Democrats chirping each other over who is embarrassing the party more. Today's battle is between John Fetterman and the undisputed leader of the Democrats, Jasmine Crockett.

Fetterman, to his credit, has attempted to be what passes as a voice of reason for the Democratic Party. Ever since October 8th, when Democrats decided to side with the people who thought the Jews asked for October 7th, the senior senator of Pennsylvania started to think to himself, "You know, I think a lot of my colleagues are crazy people. No wonder America hates us."

This was crystalized by the way
title: Jasmine Crockett LASHES OUT at John Fetterman in some left-on-left action we are so here for

description:
Marco Rubio went another round with Margaret on CBS's Face the Nation on Sunday, where the Secretary of State had to explain free speech to her again. The last time he was on, Margaret claimed free speech is how the Holocaust happened. Yesterday, she wanted to know how the White House can claim to support free speech after taking away Mahmoud Khalil's green card.

To recap, on October 7th, 2023, Israel was the victim of a heinous terrorist attack at the hands of Hamas. On October 8th, 2023, progressive students at progressive colleges in progressive cities throughout America started rallying that
title: Marco Rubio silences Margaret (again), exposes just how little the Left and the media care about free speech
